title: Discovering Homesteading vs Prepper: Which Lifestyle Suits You? | Ultimate Guide to Self-Sufficiency

tasks.task: Evaluate oneself as a homesteader or prepper and understand their core beliefs.
subtasks: Reflect on personal values and self-sufficiency.
Identify practices of growing and preserving food.
Understand the differences between long-term (homesteading) and short-term (prepping) survival goals.
Consider scenarios like power grid failure and alternative survival methods.
Share personal survival strategies and resources.

tasks.task: Discuss the similarities between homesteaders and preppers.
subtasks: Recognize shared priorities like food storage and self-reliance.
Emphasize the importance of learning and community support.
